revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: Thanks for your kind consent, & offer of the negative. The printing from it shall be done with very great care & the plate duly returned to you. Please send it to me by express, at once, well enveloped, directed

postscript.p:
431 Stevens street
cor. West
Camden
New Jersey
